title: AWS Marketplace Product Load Form - YAWL Workflow Engine
description: Product configuration template for YAWL SaaS listing on AWS Marketplace

product.title: YAWL Workflow Engine - Enterprise BPM Platform
product.shortDescription: Production-ready workflow engine with 43+ control-flow patterns for enterprise business process automation
product.longDescription:
YAWL (Yet Another Workflow Language) is a powerful BPM/Workflow engine built on formal foundations in Petri Net theory. Trusted by enterprises worldwide for mission-critical business process automation.

**Key Features:**
- 43+ Workflow Control-Flow Patterns (WCP) implemented
- Petri Net-based execution with formal verification
- Human and non-human resource management
- Dynamic process adaptation via Worklets
- Real-time process monitoring and analytics
- Calendar-based task scheduling
- Cost tracking and budgeting
- Multi-tenant architecture

**Supported Patterns Include:**
- Sequence, Parallel Split, Synchronization
- Exclusive Choice, Multi-Choice, Discriminator
- N-out-of-M, Deferred Choice, Interleaved Routing
- Milestone, Critical Section, Structured Loop
- Cancellation patterns (activity, case, region)
- Data transformation and accumulation

**Integration Options:**
- REST API (Interface A/B/E/X)
- Web-based administration console
- Custom worklist handlers
- External resource allocation

**Deployment:**
- Fully managed SaaS on AWS infrastructure
- Multi-AZ high availability
- Automatic scaling based on workload
- GDPR and SOC 2 compliant

screenshots.caption: Visual Workflow Designer - Drag-and-drop process design
Work Item Queue - Task management interface
Process Analytics - Performance metrics and KPIs

product.releaseNotes: YAWL 5.2 includes enhanced multi-tenant support, improved performance for high-volume workflows, and new integration capabilities.

grants.name: Basic Tier
grants.description: Up to 1,000 workflow executions per month, 5 active users, 10 GB data processing

grants.name: Professional Tier
grants.description: Up to 10,000 workflow executions per month, 25 active users, 100 GB data processing

grants.name: Enterprise Tier
grants.description: Up to 100,000 workflow executions per month, 100 active users, 1 TB data processing

grants.name: Unlimited Tier
grants.description: Unlimited workflow executions, unlimited users, unlimited data processing

terms.description: Annual payment schedule for upfront pricing
Bring Your Own License - for existing YAWL license holders
Pay-as-you-go for usage exceeding contract limits

dimensions.name: Workflow Executions
dimensions.description: Number of workflow instances executed (beyond included allocation)

dimensions.name: Active Users
dimensions.description: Concurrent active users accessing the system (beyond included allocation)

dimensions.name: Data Processed
dimensions.description: Total data processed through workflows in GB (beyond included allocation)

dimensions.name: API Calls
dimensions.description: API requests to YAWL interfaces (beyond included allocation)

dimensions.name: Worklet Invocations
dimensions.description: Dynamic worklet rule executions (beyond included allocation)

freeTrial.description: 14-day free trial with Professional Tier features
